scripts.build: npm install && npm run copy-static && cd web_event_timelines && npm install && npm run build && npm run copy-vue
scripts.copy-static: mkdir -p dist && cp index.html dist/ && cp process.html dist/ && mkdir -p dist/images && cp -r images/* dist/images/
scripts.copy-vue: mkdir -p ../dist/web_event_timelines && cp -r dist/* ../dist/web_event_timelines/ && cp -r data ../dist/web_event_timelines/ && mkdir -p ../dist/web_event_timelines/template/images && cp -r template/images/* ../dist/web_event_timelines/template/images/
